title: The Adventures of David Campbell: The Consulting Crusader

story.text: David Campbell starts his week as usual, consulting for local businesses on improving their operations. Little does he know a strange meteor shower the previous night has given him the ability to see into the future.
Using his newfound ability, David foresees a major financial crisis that could ruin several of his clients. He spends the day coaching businesses to pivot their strategies, averting disaster.

David encounters a lost child who is searching for her parents. By tapping into his visions, he successfully reunites the family, discovering his powers could also track individuals by seeing their near futures.
The local bank is threatened by a notorious gang. David, foreseeing the heist, coaches the bank's security team on countermeasures, thwarting the robbery without anyone realizing how they knew.
David's abilities begin to take a toll on him, causing severe headaches. Despite this, he assists the police in solving a complex case by predicting the perpetrator's next move.
Realizing the personal risks of using his powers continuously, David decides to spend the day in reflection and masters the control over his gifts to minimize the physical backlash.

Grateful for his powers but wary of dependence, David launches a free coaching workshop to empower his community with skills to handle their own crises, ensuring they're prepared for future challenges without him.

ending: Thus, David Campbell realized that true heroism lies not just in saving the day, but in empowering others to save their own days.
moral: With great power comes the responsibility to teach others to be powerful.
